text: The Machai Hydropower Plant is a run-of-the-river hydroelectric power plant with a generating capacity of 2.6 MW. Construction of the damn crossing the Machai Canal began in 2013 and was completed in March 2015 at the cost of PKR 683.50 million. == References == Category:Dams in Pakistan Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Pakistan
title: Machai Hydropower Plant
